channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Product Slider for WooCommerce by PickPlugins
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Product Slider for WooCommerce by PickPlugins

item.title: CVE-2023-0166|2024-08-02T05:02:43.987Z -- unknown -- product%20slider%20for%20woocommerce%20by%20pickplugins
item.description: The Product Slider for WooCommerce by PickPlugins WordPress plugin before 1.13.42 does not validate and escape some of its shortcode attributes before outputting them back in a page/post where the shortcode is embed, which could allow users with the contributor role and above to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks.
